thread.title: BRIEF-Raytheon Wins $83 Mln Mine Neutralizer Contract

title: BRIEF-Raytheon Wins $83 Mln Mine Neutralizer Contract
text:
April 19, 2018 / 1:12 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Raytheon Wins $83 Mln Mine Neutralizer Contract Reuters Staff 
April 19 (Reuters) - Raytheon Co: * RAYTHEON AWARDED $83 MILLION MINE NEUTRALIZER CONTRACT 
* RAYTHEON CO - AWARDED AN $83 MILLION CONTRACT FOR DESIGN, TEST AND DEPLOYMENT OF BARRACUDA MINE NEUTRALIZATION SYSTEM 
* RAYTHEON CO - CONTRACT INCLUDES OPTIONS WHICH, IF EXERCISED, WOULD BRING CUMULATIVE VALUE OF CONTRACT TO $362.7 MILLION 
* RAYTHEON CO - NAVAL SEA SYSTEMS COMMAND, WASHINGTON, DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, IS CONTRACTING ACTIVITY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
